NOTES: On 28 March 2023, during clashes throughout the day, Ukrainian forces (of Operational Command 'South' using aviation, UAVs, missiles and artillery), destroyed 8 units of Russian military equipment (i.e., 3 towed-artillery, 4 vehicles, including 2 loaded with ammo, 1 recon drone) in the Kherson region, military casualties is unknown. Also, Russian air forces carried out airstrikes by 'Kh-31' anti-radar missiles and guided aerial bombs at the Kherson region. As a result of Russian shelling of the right-bank of the Kherson region, objects of civilian infrastructure, including 20 houses were damaged and 5 civilians injured. According to Russian sources, on that day, up to 40 Ukrainian servicemen were killed during fighting with Russian forces, three vehicles, a Gvozdika self-propelled howitzer and an M777 artillery system were destroyed in the course of the fire attack of Russian forces during the day (coded to Kherson). [Russian MoD reported 40 fatalities. Coded as 10 fatalities].
